{{< entity_summary >}}
The Government of Canada spent an estimated **\$11.7M in 2021-2022** on contracts with NEWDOCK ST JOHN S DOCKYARD.

Across 37 contracts active since the start of the 2017-2018 fiscal year, 31 have at least one amendment (84%). Of contracts with amendments, the average increase in dollar value was 53% and the average number of amendments was 1.61. Cumulatively these amendments represent an increase of \$36.1M over the original contract values.

The average contract duration was 0.19 years, and the average contract value (not including contracts under \$10k) was \$2.6M. The longest contract was 1.55 years. The largest contract by value (including amendments) was \$22.8M.

{{< /entity_summary >}}
